00018 #ifndef COBASE_SCOPEDMUTEX_H
00019 #define COBASE_SCOPEDMUTEX_H
00020 
00021 #include <co/base/lock.h>        // used in inline method
00022 #include <co/base/lockable.h>    // used in inline method
00023 #include <co/base/nonCopyable.h> // base class
00024 
00025 
00026 namespace co
00027 {
00028 namespace base
00029 {
00037     template< class L = Lock > class ScopedMutex : public NonCopyable
00038     {
00039     public:
00049         explicit ScopedMutex( L* lock ) : _lock( lock )
00050             { if( lock ) lock->set(); }
00051 
00053         explicit ScopedMutex( L& lock ) : _lock( &lock )
00054             { lock.set(); }
00055 
00060         template< typename LB > ScopedMutex( LB& lockable )
00061                 : _lock( &lockable.lock ) { _lock->set(); }
00062 
00064         ~ScopedMutex() { leave(); }
00065 
00067         void leave() { if( _lock ) _lock->unset(); _lock = 0; }
00068 
00069     private:
00070         ScopedMutex() : _lock( 0 ) {}
00071         L* _lock;
00072     };
00073 }
00074 }
00075 #endif //COBASE_SCOPEDMUTEX_H
